parameter.value: Nice to see you, |PLAYERNAME|! Ask me for a trade if you like to see my exclusive offers.
Sure, take a look, honey.
Bye, bye, |PLAYERNAME|.
Bye, bye.
help;stuff;wares;offert;weapons;shield;armors;helmets;equipment;job;name;time;Tibia;sell;mission;quest;flowers;honey flowers;dungeon;monsters;Thais;Dallheim
I am already helping you by selling stuff.
I sell equipment of all kinds. Just ask me about the type of wares you are interested in.
I sell weapons, shields, armor, helmets and equipment. For what do you want to ask?
I sell weapons, shields, armor, helmets and equipment. For what do you want to ask?
I sell spears, rapiers, sabres, daggers, hand axes, axes and short sword. Just tell me what you want to buy.
I sell wooden shields and studded shields. Just tell me what you want to buy.
I sell jackets, coats, doublets, leather armor, and leather legs. Just tell me what you want to buy.
I sell leather helmets, studded helmets, and chain helmets. Just tell me what you want to buy.
I sell torches, bags, scrolls, shovels, picks, backpacks, sickles, scythes, ropes, fishing rods and sixpack of worms. Just tell me what you want to buy.
I am a merchant, so what can I do for you?
My name is.....Do you want to buy something?
It is about 10:12 am. I am so sorry, I have no watches to sell. Do you want to buy something else?
The continent is even more exciting that this isle!
I sell much. Have a look at the blackboards for my wares or just ask.
I really love flowers. Sadly my favourites, honey flowers are very rare on this isle. If you can find me one, I'll give you a little reward.
I really love flowers. Sadly my favourites, honey flowers are very rare on this isle. If you can find me one, I'll give you a little reward.
I really love flowers. Sadly my favourites, honey flowers are very rare on this isle. If you can find me one, I'll give you a little reward.
Honey flowers are my favourites.
Be carefull down there. Make sure you bought enough torches and a rope or you might get lost.
There are plenty of them. Buy here the equipmente to kill them and sell their loot afterwards!
Thais is the capital of the thaian empire.
He is a great warrior and our protector.
